summary.p: NQuery provides member completion and parameter info code assistance features. These features are directly built into the NQuery core assembly. So if you cannot use the provided Actipro Synatx Editor Integration you can still use these features to integrate in your own syntax editor without starting from scratch. See Custom Code Assistance for details.

section.title: Member Completion
section.p: Member completion is a code assistance feature that helps you to explore the tables, properties, functions, methods and all other stuff by providing a list of all elements that are accessible at a certain location in the source code.
Since this feature is context-aware the contents of member completion list depends on usage. For example, it can provide a list of all elements of the DataContext:
In a join context it provides you a list with all reachable tables:
In a join condition context it provides you a list of all applicable join conditions:
In an expresion context it provides a list of members (i.e. columns, properties and methods):

section.title: Parameter Info
section.p: Parameter info provides you with a list of function- or method signatures applicable at a certain source code location.
